Dominion [startdom]: 1

The Leader of the Closed Council is an ancient Oracle of the Deep, hailed as the greatest mage of the ages. Donning a godly mantle, the Oracle has taken the role of a Pretender God to lead Agartha to a promised future. The Oracle is able to foresee things that have not yet come to pass and can prevent disasters.
